LanguageData.OE_Beacongroup_OMC.leaderDescription: Combat squad led by {LEADERKIND_label} armed with OMC gear.

LanguageData.OE_Beacongroup_OES.leaderDescription: Lost Eidolon squad led by {LEADERKIND_label} armed with heroic gear.
LanguageData.OE_Beacongroup_CrimsonArachna.leaderDesc: The {LEADERKIND_label} is a Crimson Arachna Cult's mechanoid commander with a built-in mech gestator and is capable of deploying arachna drone combat mechs.
LanguageData.OE_Beacongroup_FallenLegion.leaderDescri: The {LEADERKIND_label} is a Obsidia Empire Sins fortress-sized mechanoid commander designed for suppression of enemies and total control of the battlefield.
LanguageData.OE_Beacongroup_CAC_Anomaly.leaderDescrip: Cultists entities squad led by {LEADERKIND_label} armed with CAC gear.
